name: Extreme Drift (Next-Gen Games)
description:
this is game it simulation the physics of real car and it have good graphics

Free Driving

Get ready for free rides in a big city. The free mode area contains large buildings, wide streets, stunt areas, and many mysterious areas. There are 50 gems hidden in the city. By collecting these gems, you can have new vehicles. The "Reward" table opens every 180 seconds. In this "Reward" table, you earn money based on your drift and flight points. If you wait 180 seconds, you will get good rewards. When the number of keys reaches a certain level, the vehicle is opened for automatic use.

Features:
- Precise control and fun to drive vehicles even with keyboard
- Any vehicle setup: street, truck, racing, drifting...
- Vehicles can be rigged and configured in minutes
- Vehicle damage effects, including deterioration of handling.
- Multiple ground materials supported, including per-material grip and drag coefficients, ground marks, skid marks, smoke, dust, etc.
- Lots of audio effects: engine, turbo, transmission, tire skid, body impacts, body scratches...
- Built-in “Pause” function for vehicles without setting timeScale to zero.

-it Have 11 Super Cars and 1 Police Car.
